title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the year in which a presidential candidate had the greatest percent of the popular vote in a presidential election.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the overall trend in the percent of the popular vote of third-party/independent candidates.

For Task C, the response must use the data to correctly draw a conclusion about how the third-party/independent candidate may have affected the outcome of the 1992 presidential election.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain why the data in the bar graph does not necessarily relate to the outcome of presidential elections.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the prompt.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the prompt.
